content:
```xml
<repairs>
    DEL_EDGE | (rm) | -
</repairs>
```

This repair operation removes the relationship between the patient "Earle679" and the medication "Humulin 70/30 Injectable Suspension," which contains an ingredient "mestranol" to which the patient is allergic. This ensures that the patient does not take a medication containing an allergen, aligning with the requirement stated in the inconsistency description.
